title: Aliens vs. Predator + 2 DLC
body:
Aliens vs. Predator + 2 DLC


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Rebellion Developments / Sega
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 18.3 GB
Repack Size: from 4.1 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Aliens.vs.Predator.MULTi8-PROPHET ISO release: ppt-avpz.iso (19,598,139,392 bytes)
  • Both DLCs (Swarm Map Pack & Bughunt Map Pack) included and activated (available in MP/SP Survival only)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Alternative UberPsyX SteamFix included, allows multiplayer between the same crack users. Located in NoDVD folder after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of language packs and MP/SP Survivor files
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 18.3 to 4.1~4.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes (SP only): ~15 minutes on 4-cores + SSD; ~35 minutes on 4-cores CPU + HDD; ~45 minutes on 2-cores + HDD. Installing Multiplayer/Survival files adds 5-15 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 13/17 GB (up to 23 GB during installation)

The single-player campaign for English, German, Polish and Czech users is included in main setup files.

And you can skip downloading of files you don’t need. Here is the list of optional/selective files:

  • setup-fitgirl-optional-mp-and-sp-survival.bin (Multiplayer support + Singleplayer Survivor mode maps)
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-selective-french.bin (French files)
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-selective-italian.bin (Italian files)
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-selective-russian.bin (Russian files)
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-selective-spanish.bin (Spanish files)

In example, if you want to run the game in SP with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective/optional” files,
but download setup-fitgirl-optional-selective-spanish.bin & all main files (01-10).

Game Description

Bringing the legendary war between two of science-fiction’s most popular characters to FPS fans, AvP delivers three outstanding single player campaigns and provides untold hours of unique 3-way multiplayer gaming.

Experience distinctly new and thrilling first person gameplay as you survive, hunt and prey in the deadly jungles and swamps surrounding the damned colony of Freya’s Prospect.
